Amazon API Gateway Management                            apigateway:AddCertificateToDomain                                                Permissions management  Grants permission to add certificates for mutual TLS authentication to a domain name. This is an additional authorization control for managing the DomainName resource due to the sensitive nature of mTLS

Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:AssociateAppBlockBuilderAppBlock                                       Write                   Grants permission to associate the specified app block builder with the app block
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:AssociateApplicationFleet                                              Write                   Grants permission to associate the specified application with the fleet
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:AssociateApplicationToEntitlement                                      Write                   Grants permission to associate the specified application to the specified entitlement
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:AssociateFleet                                                         Write                   Grants permission to associate the specified fleet with the specified stack
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:BatchAssociateUserStack                                                Write                   Grants permission to associate the specified users with the specified stacks. Users in a user pool cannot be assigned to stacks with fleets that are joined to an Active Directory domain
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:BatchDisassociateUserStack                                             Write                   Grants permission to disassociate the specified users from the specified stacks
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CopyImage                                                              Write                   Grants permission to copy the specified image within the same Region or to a new Region within the same AWS account
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateAppBlock                                                         Write                   Grants permission to create an app block. App blocks store details about the virtual hard disk that contains the files for the application in an S3 bucket. It also stores the setup script with details about how to mount the virtual hard disk. App blocks are only supported for Elastic fleets
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateAppBlockBuilder                                                  Write                   Grants permission to create an app block builder. An app block builder is a virtual machine that is used to create an app block
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateAppBlockBuilderStreamingURL                                      Write                   Grants permission to create a URL to start an app block builder streaming session
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateApplication                                                      Write                   Grants permission to create an application within customer account. Applications store the details about how to launch applications on streaming instances. This is only supported for Elastic fleets
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateDirectoryConfig                                                  Write                   Grants permission to create a Directory Config object in AppStream 2.0. This object includes the configuration information required to join fleets and image builders to Microsoft Active Directory domains
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateEntitlement                                                      Write                   Grants permission to create an entitlement to control access to applications based on user attributes
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateFleet                                                            Write                   Grants permission to create a fleet. A fleet is a group of streaming instances from which applications are launched and streamed to users
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateImageBuilder                                                     Write                   Grants permission to create an image builder. An image builder is a virtual machine that is used to create an image
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateImageBuilderStreamingURL                                         Write                   Grants permission to create a URL to start an image builder streaming session
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateStack                                                            Write                   Grants permission to create a stack to start streaming applications to users. A stack consists of an associated fleet, user access policies, and storage configurations
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateStreamingURL                                                     Write                   Grants permission to create a temporary URL to start an AppStream 2.0 streaming session for the specified user. A streaming URL enables application streaming to be tested without user setup
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateThemeForStack                                                    Write                   Grants permission to create a custom branding theme, which might includes a custom logo, website links, and other branding to display to your users
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateUpdatedImage                                                     Write                   Grants permission to update an existing image within customer account
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateUsageReportSubscription                                          Write                   Grants permission to create a usage report subscription. Usage reports are generated daily
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:CreateUser                                                             Write                   Grants permission to create a new user in the user pool
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteAppBlock                                                         Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified app block
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteAppBlockBuilder                                                  Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified app block builder and release capacity
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteApplication                                                      Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified application
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteDirectoryConfig                                                  Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified Directory Config object from AppStream 2.0. This object includes the configuration information required to join fleets and image builders to Microsoft Active Directory domains
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteEntitlement                                                      Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified entitlement
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteFleet                                                            Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified fleet
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteImage                                                            Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified image. An image cannot be deleted when it is in use
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteImageBuilder                                                     Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified image builder and release capacity
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteImagePermissions                                                 Write                   Grants permission to delete permissions for the specified private image
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteStack                                                            Write                   Grants permission to delete the specified stack. After the stack is deleted, the application streaming environment provided by the stack is no longer available to users. Also, any reservations made for application streaming sessions for the stack are released
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteThemeForStack                                                    Write                   Grants permission to delete a custom branding theme, which might includes a custom logo, website links, and other branding to display to your users
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteUsageReportSubscription                                          Write                   Grants permission to disable usage report generation
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DeleteUser                                                             Write                   Grants permission to delete a user from the user pool
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeAppBlockBuilderAppBlockAssociations                            Read                    Grants permission to retrieve the associations that are associated with the specified app block builder or app block
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeAppBlockBuilders                                               Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified app block builders, if the app block builder names are provided. Otherwise, all app block builders in the account are described
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeAppBlocks                                                      Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified app blocks, if the app block arns are provided. Otherwise, all app blocks in the account are described
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeApplicationFleetAssociations                                   Read                    Grants permission to retrieve the associations that are associated with the specified application or fleet
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeApplications                                                   Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified applications, if the application arns are provided. Otherwise, all applications in the account are described
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeDirectoryConfigs                                               Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified Directory Config objects for AppStream 2.0, if the names for these objects are provided. Otherwise, all Directory Config objects in the account are described. This object includes the configuration information required to join fleets and image builders to Microsoft Active Directory domains
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeEntitlements                                                   Read                    Grants permission to retrieve one or all entitlements for the specified stack
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeFleets                                                         Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified fleets, if the fleet names are provided. Otherwise, all fleets in the account are described
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeImageBuilders                                                  Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified image builders, if the image builder names are provided. Otherwise, all image builders in the account are described
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeImagePermissions                                               Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes the permissions for shared AWS account IDs on a private image that you own
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeImages                                                         Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified images, if the image names or image ARNs are provided. Otherwise, all images in the account are described
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeSessions                                                       Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes the streaming sessions for the specified stack and fleet. If a user ID is provided for the stack and fleet, only the streaming sessions for that user are described
Amazon AppStream 2.0                                     appstream:DescribeStacks                                                         Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified stacks, if the stack names are provided. Otherwise, all stacks in the account are described

Amazon Connect                                           connect:SubmitContactEvaluation                                                  Write                   Grants permission to submit a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance. Answers included in the request are merged with existing answers for the given evaluation. If no answers or notes are passed, the evaluation is submitted with the existing answers and notes. You can delete an answer or note by passing an empty object (<span>{</span>}) to the question identifier

AWS Direct Connect                                       directconnect:TagResource                                                        Tagging                 Grants permission to add the specified tags to the specified AWS Direct Connect resource. Each resource can have a maximum of 50 tags

AWS Direct Connect                                       directconnect:UpdateConnection                                                   Write                   Grants permission to update the AWS Direct Connect dedicated connection configuration. You can update the following parameters for a connection: The connection name or The connection's MAC Security (MACsec) encryption mode
AWS Direct Connect                                       directconnect:UpdateDirectConnectGateway                                         Write                   Grants permission to update the name of a Direct Connect gateway
AWS Direct Connect                                       directconnect:UpdateDirectConnectGatewayAssociation                              Write                   Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the Direct Connect gateway association
AWS Direct Connect                                       directconnect:UpdateLag                                                          Write                   Grants permission to update the attributes of the specified link aggregation group (LAG)
AWS Direct Connect                                       directconnect:UpdateVirtualInterfaceAttributes                                   Write                   Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified virtual private interface
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:AssociateConfigurationItemsToApplication                               Write                   Grants permission to AssociateConfigurationItemsToApplication API. AssociateConfigurationItemsToApplication associates one or more configuration items with an application
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:BatchDeleteAgents                                                      Write                   Grants permission to BatchDeleteAgents API. BatchDeleteAgents deletes one or more agents/data collectors associated with your account, each identified by its agent ID. Deleting a data collector does not delete the previous data collected
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:BatchDeleteImportData                                                  Write                   Grants permission to BatchDeleteImportData API. BatchDeleteImportData deletes one or more Migration Hub import tasks, each identified by their import ID. Each import task has a number of records, which can identify servers or applications
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:CreateApplication                                                      Write                   Grants permission to CreateApplication API. CreateApplication creates an application with the given name and description
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:CreateTags                                                             Tagging                 Grants permission to CreateTags API. CreateTags creates one or more tags for configuration items. Tags are metadata that help you categorize IT assets. This API accepts a list of multiple configuration items
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DeleteApplications                                                     Write                   Grants permission to DeleteApplications API. DeleteApplications deletes a list of applications and their associations with configuration items
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DeleteTags                                                             Tagging                 Grants permission to DeleteTags API. DeleteTags deletes the association between configuration items and one or more tags. This API accepts a list of multiple configuration items
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeAgents                                                         Read                    Grants permission to DescribeAgents API. DescribeAgents lists agents or the Connector by ID or lists all agents/Connectors associated with your user if you did not specify an ID
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeBatchDeleteConfigurationTask                                   Read                    Grants permission to DescribeBatchDeleteConfigurationTask API. DescribeBatchDeleteConfigurationTask returns attributes about a batched deletion task to delete a set of configuration items. The supplied task ID should be the task ID receieved from the output of StartBatchDeleteConfigurationTask
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeConfigurations                                                 Read                    Grants permission to DescribeConfigurations API. DescribeConfigurations retrieves attributes for a list of configuration item IDs. All of the supplied IDs must be for the same asset type (server, application, process, or connection). Output fields are specific to the asset type selected. For example, the output for a server configuration item includes a list of attributes about the server, such as host name, operating system, and number of network cards
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeContinuousExports                                              Read                    Grants permission to DescribeContinuousExports API. DescribeContinuousExports lists exports as specified by ID. All continuous exports associated with your user can be listed if you call DescribeContinuousExports as is without passing any parameters
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeExportConfigurations                                           Read                    Grants permission to DescribeExportConfigurations API. DescribeExportConfigurations retrieves the status of a given export process. You can retrieve status from a maximum of 100 processes
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeExportTasks                                                    Read                    Grants permission to DescribeExportTasks API. DescribeExportTasks retrieve status of one or more export tasks. You can retrieve the status of up to 100 export tasks
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeImportTasks                                                    List                    Grants permission to DescribeImportTasks API. DescribeImportTasks returns an array of import tasks for your user, including status information, times, IDs, the Amazon S3 Object URL for the import file, and more
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DescribeTags                                                           Read                    Grants permission to DescribeTags API. DescribeTags retrieves a list of configuration items that are tagged with a specific tag. Or retrieves a list of all tags assigned to a specific configuration item
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:DisassociateConfigurationItemsFromApplication                          Write                   Grants permission to DisassociateConfigurationItemsFromApplication API. DisassociateConfigurationItemsFromApplication disassociates one or more configuration items from an application
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:ExportConfigurations                                                   Write                   Grants permission to ExportConfigurations API. ExportConfigurations exports all discovered configuration data to an Amazon S3 bucket or an application that enables you to view and evaluate the data. Data includes tags and tag associations, processes, connections, servers, and system performance
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:GetDiscoverySummary                                                    Read                    Grants permission to GetDiscoverySummary API. GetDiscoverySummary retrieves a short summary of discovered assets
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:GetNetworkConnectionGraph                                              Read                    Grants permission to GetNetworkConnectionGraph API. GetNetworkConnectionGraph accepts input list of one of - Ip Addresses, server ids or node ids. Returns a list of nodes and edges which help customer visualize network connection graph. This API is used for visualize network graph functionality in MigrationHub console
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:ListConfigurations                                                     List                    Grants permission to ListConfigurations API. ListConfigurations retrieves a list of configuration items according to criteria you specify in a filter. The filter criteria identify relationship requirements
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:ListServerNeighbors                                                    List                    Grants permission to ListServerNeighbors API. ListServerNeighbors retrieves a list of servers which are one network hop away from a specified server
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:StartBatchDeleteConfigurationTask                                      Write                   Grants permission to StartBatchDeleteConfigurationTask API. StartBatchDeleteConfigurationTask starts an asynchronous batch deletion of your configuration items. All of the supplied IDs must be for the same asset type (server, application, process, or connection). Output is a unique task ID you can use to check back on the deletions progress
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:StartContinuousExport                                                  Write                   Grants permission to StartContinuousExport API. StartContinuousExport start the continuous flow of agent's discovered data into Amazon Athena
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:StartDataCollectionByAgentIds                                          Write                   Grants permission to StartDataCollectionByAgentIds API. StartDataCollectionByAgentIds instructs the specified agents or Connectors to start collecting data
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:StartExportTask                                                        Write                   Grants permission to StartExportTask API. StartExportTask export the configuration data about discovered configuration items and relationships to an S3 bucket in a specified format
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:StartImportTask                                                        Write                   Grants permission to StartImportTask API. StartImportTask starts an import task. The Migration Hub import feature allows you to import details of your on-premises environment directly into AWS without having to use the Application Discovery Service (ADS) tools such as the Discovery Connector or Discovery Agent. This gives you the option to perform migration assessment and planning directly from your imported data including the ability to group your devices as applications and track their migration status
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:StopContinuousExport                                                   Write                   Grants permission to StopContinuousExport API. StopContinuousExport stops the continuous flow of agent's discovered data into Amazon Athena
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:StopDataCollectionByAgentIds                                           Write                   Grants permission to StopDataCollectionByAgentIds API. StopDataCollectionByAgentIds instructs the specified agents or Connectors to stop collecting data
AWS Application Discovery Service                        discovery:UpdateApplication                                                      Write                   Grants permission to UpdateApplication API. UpdateApplication updates metadata about an application
Amazon Data Lifecycle Manager                            dlm:CreateLifecyclePolicy                                                        Write                   Grants permission to create a data lifecycle policy to manage the scheduled creation and retention of Amazon EBS snapshots. You may have up to 100 policies
Amazon Data Lifecycle Manager                            dlm:DeleteLifecyclePolicy                                                        Write                   Grants permission to delete an existing data lifecycle policy. In addition, this action halts the creation and deletion of snapshots that the policy specified. Existing snapshots are not affected

Based on the difference between current value and new value (provided through this API call), domain controllers will be added or removed. It may take up to 45 minutes for any new domain controllers to become fully active once the requested number of domain controllers is updated. During this time, you cannot make another update request

Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteDetector                                                     Write                   Grants permission to delete the detector. Before deleting a detector, you must first delete all detector versions and rule versions associated with the detector
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteDetectorVersion                                              Write                   Grants permission to delete the detector version. You cannot delete detector versions that are in ACTIVE status
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteEntityType                                                   Write                   Grants permission to delete an entity type. You cannot delete an entity type that is included in an event type

Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteEventsByEventType                                            Write                   Grants permission to delete events for the specified event type
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteEventType                                                    Write                   Grants permission to delete an event type. You cannot delete an event type that is used in a detector or a model
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteExternalModel                                                Write                   Grants permission to remove a SageMaker model from Amazon Fraud Detector. You can remove an Amazon SageMaker model if it is not associated with a detector version
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteLabel                                                        Write                   Grants permission to delete a label. You cannot delete labels that are included in an event type in Amazon Fraud Detector. You cannot delete a label assigned to an event ID. You must first delete the relevant event ID
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteList                                                         Write                   Grants permission to delete a list
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteModel                                                        Write                   Grants permission to delete a model. You can delete models and model versions in Amazon Fraud Detector, provided that they are not associated with a detector version
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteModelVersion                                                 Write                   Grants permission to delete a model version. You can delete models and model versions in Amazon Fraud Detector, provided that they are not associated with a detector version
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteOutcome                                                      Write                   Grants permission to delete an outcome. You cannot delete an outcome that is used in a rule version
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteRule                                                         Write                   Grants permission to delete the rule. You cannot delete a rule if it is used by an ACTIVE or INACTIVE detector version
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DeleteVariable                                                     Write                   Grants permission to delete a variable. You cannot delete variables that are included in an event type in Amazon Fraud Detector
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:DescribeDetector                                                   Read                    Grants permission to get all versions for a specified detector

Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:GetBatchPredictionJobs                                             List                    Grants permission to get all batch prediction jobs or a specific job if you specify a job ID. This is a paginated API. If you provide a null maxResults, this action retrieves a maximum of 50 records per page. If you provide a maxResults, the value must be between 1 and 50. To get the next page results, provide the pagination token from the GetBatchPredictionJobsResponse as part of your request. A null pagination token fetches the records from the beginning

This is a paginated API. If you provide a null maxResults, this action retrieves a maximum of 10 records per page. If you provide a maxResults, the value must be between 5 and 10. To get the next page results, provide the pagination token from the GetDetectorsResponse as part of your request. A null pagination token fetches the records from the beginning

To get the next page results, provide the pagination token from the GetEntityTypesResponse as part of your request. A null pagination token fetches the records from the beginning

Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:PutDetector                                                        Write                   Grants permission to create or update a detector
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:PutEntityType                                                      Write                   Grants permission to create or update an entity type. An entity represents who is performing the event. As part of a fraud prediction, you pass the entity ID to indicate the specific entity who performed the event. An entity type classifies the entity. Example classifications include customer, merchant, or account
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:PutEventType                                                       Write                   Grants permission to create or update an event type. An event is a business activity that is evaluated for fraud risk. With Amazon Fraud Detector, you generate fraud predictions for events. An event type defines the structure for an event sent to Amazon Fraud Detector. This includes the variables sent as part of the event, the entity performing the event (such as a customer), and the labels that classify the event. Example event types include online payment transactions, account registrations, and authentications
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:PutExternalModel                                                   Write                   Grants permission to create or update an Amazon SageMaker model endpoint. You can also use this action to update the configuration of the model endpoint, including the IAM role and/or the mapped variables
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:PutKMSEncryptionKey                                                Write                   Grants permission to specify the Key Management Service (KMS) customer master key (CMK) to be used to encrypt content in Amazon Fraud Detector
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:PutLabel                                                           Write                   Grants permission to create or update label. A label classifies an event as fraudulent or legitimate. Labels are associated with event types and used to train supervised machine learning models in Amazon Fraud Detector
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:PutOutcome                                                         Write                   Grants permission to create or update an outcome
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:SendEvent                                                          Write                   Grants permission to send event
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:TagResource                                                        Tagging                 Grants permission to assign tags to a resource
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UntagResource                                                      Tagging                 Grants permission to remove tags from a resource
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateDetectorVersion                                              Write                   Grants permission to update a detector version. The detector version attributes that you can update include models, external model endpoints, rules, rule execution mode, and description. You can only update a DRAFT detector version
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateDetectorVersionMetadata                                      Write                   Grants permission to update the detector version's description. You can update the metadata for any detector version (DRAFT, ACTIVE, or INACTIVE)
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateDetectorVersionStatus                                        Write                   Grants permission to update the detector versionâs status. You can perform the following promotions or demotions using UpdateDetectorVersionStatus: DRAFT to ACTIVE, ACTIVE to INACTIVE, and INACTIVE to ACTIVE
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateEventLabel                                                   Write                   Grants permission to update an existing event record's label value
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateList                                                         Write                   Grants permission to update a list
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateModel                                                        Write                   Grants permission to update a model. You can update the description attribute using this action
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateModelVersion                                                 Write                   Grants permission to update a model version. Updating a model version retrains an existing model version using updated training data and produces a new minor version of the model. You can update the training data set location and data access role attributes using this action. This action creates and trains a new minor version of the model, for example version 1.01, 1.02, 1.03
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateModelVersionStatus                                           Write                   Grants permission to update the status of a model version
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateRuleMetadata                                                 Write                   Grants permission to update a rule's metadata. The description attribute can be updated
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateRuleVersion                                                  Write                   Grants permission to update a rule version resulting in a new rule version. Updates a rule version resulting in a new rule version (version 1, 2, 3 ...)
Amazon Fraud Detector                                    frauddetector:UpdateVariable                                                     Write                   Grants permission to update a variable

AWS Key Management Service                               kms:CancelKeyDeletion                                                            Write                   Controls permission to cancel the scheduled deletion of an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ConnectCustomKeyStore                                                        Write                   Controls permission to connect or reconnect a custom key store to its associated AWS CloudHSM cluster or external key manager outside of AWS
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:CreateAlias                                                                  Write                   Controls permission to create an alias for an AWS KMS key. Aliases are optional friendly names that you can associate with KMS keys
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:CreateCustomKeyStore                                                         Write                   Controls permission to create a custom key store that is backed by an AWS CloudHSM cluster or an external key manager outside of AWS
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:CreateGrant                                                                  Permissions management  Controls permission to add a grant to an AWS KMS key. You can use grants to add permissions without changing the key policy or IAM policy
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:CreateKey                                                                    Write                   Controls permission to create an AWS KMS key that can be used to protect data keys and other sensitive information
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:Decrypt                                                                      Write                   Controls permission to decrypt ciphertext that was encrypted under an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DeleteAlias                                                                  Write                   Controls permission to delete an alias. Aliases are optional friendly names that you can associate with AWS KMS keys
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DeleteCustomKeyStore                                                         Write                   Controls permission to delete a custom key store
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DeleteImportedKeyMaterial                                                    Write                   Controls permission to delete cryptographic material that you imported into an AWS KMS key. This action makes the key unusable
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DeriveSharedSecret                                                           Write                   Controls permission to use the specified AWS KMS key to derive shared secrets
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DescribeCustomKeyStores                                                      Read                    Controls permission to view detailed information about custom key stores in the account and region
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DescribeKey                                                                  Read                    Controls permission to view detailed information about an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DisableKey                                                                   Write                   Controls permission to disable an AWS KMS key, which prevents it from being used in cryptographic operations
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DisableKeyRotation                                                           Write                   Controls permission to disable automatic rotation of a customer managed AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:DisconnectCustomKeyStore                                                     Write                   Controls permission to disconnect the custom key store from its associated AWS CloudHSM cluster or external key manager outside of AWS
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:EnableKey                                                                    Write                   Controls permission to change the state of an AWS KMS key to enabled. This allows the KMS key to be used in cryptographic operations
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:EnableKeyRotation                                                            Write                   Controls permission to enable automatic rotation of the cryptographic material in an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:Encrypt                                                                      Write                   Controls permission to use the specified AWS KMS key to encrypt data and data keys
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GenerateDataKey                                                              Write                   Controls permission to use the AWS KMS key to generate data keys. You can use the data keys to encrypt data outside of AWS KMS
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GenerateDataKeyPair                                                          Write                   Controls permission to use the AWS KMS key to generate data key pairs
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GenerateDataKeyPairWithoutPlaintext                                          Write                   Controls permission to use the AWS KMS key to generate data key pairs. Unlike the GenerateDataKeyPair operation, this operation returns an encrypted private key without a plaintext copy
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GenerateDataKeyWithoutPlaintext                                              Write                   Controls permission to use the AWS KMS key to generate a data key. Unlike the GenerateDataKey operation, this operation returns an encrypted data key without a plaintext version of the data key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GenerateMac                                                                  Write                   Controls permission to use the AWS KMS key to generate message authentication codes
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GenerateRandom                                                               Write                   Controls permission to get a cryptographically secure random byte string from AWS KMS
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GetKeyPolicy                                                                 Read                    Controls permission to view the key policy for the specified AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GetKeyRotationStatus                                                         Read                    Controls permission to view the key rotation status for an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GetParametersForImport                                                       Read                    Controls permission to get data that is required to import cryptographic material into a customer managed key, including a public key and import token
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:GetPublicKey                                                                 Read                    Controls permission to download the public key of an asymmetric AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ImportKeyMaterial                                                            Write                   Controls permission to import cryptographic material into an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ListAliases                                                                  List                    Controls permission to view the aliases that are defined in the account. Aliases are optional friendly names that you can associate with AWS KMS keys
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ListGrants                                                                   List                    Controls permission to view all grants for an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ListKeyPolicies                                                              List                    Controls permission to view the names of key policies for an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ListKeyRotations                                                             List                    Controls permission to view the list of completed key rotations for an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ListKeys                                                                     List                    Controls permission to view the key ID and Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of all AWS KMS keys in the account
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ListResourceTags                                                             List                    Controls permission to view all tags that are attached to an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ListRetirableGrants                                                          List                    Controls permission to view grants in which the specified principal is the retiring principal. Other principals might be able to retire the grant and this principal might be able to retire other grants
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:PutKeyPolicy                                                                 Permissions management  Controls permission to replace the key policy for the specified AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ReEncryptFrom                                                                Write                   Controls permission to decrypt data as part of the process that decrypts and reencrypts the data within AWS KMS
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ReEncryptTo                                                                  Write                   Controls permission to encrypt data as part of the process that decrypts and reencrypts the data within AWS KMS
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ReplicateKey                                                                 Write                   Controls permission to replicate a multi-Region primary key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:RetireGrant                                                                  Permissions management  Controls permission to retire a grant. The RetireGrant operation is typically called by the grant user after they complete the tasks that the grant allowed them to perform
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:RevokeGrant                                                                  Permissions management  Controls permission to revoke a grant, which denies permission for all operations that depend on the grant
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:RotateKeyOnDemand                                                            Write                   Controls permission to invoke on-demand rotation of the cryptographic material in an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:ScheduleKeyDeletion                                                          Write                   Controls permission to schedule deletion of an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:Sign                                                                         Write                   Controls permission to produce a digital signature for a message
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:SynchronizeMultiRegionKey                                                    Write                   Controls access to internal APIs that synchronize multi-Region keys
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:TagResource                                                                  Tagging                 Controls permission to create or update tags that are attached to an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:UntagResource                                                                Tagging                 Controls permission to delete tags that are attached to an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:UpdateAlias                                                                  Write                   Controls permission to associate an alias with a different AWS KMS key. An alias is an optional friendly name that you can associate with a KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:UpdateCustomKeyStore                                                         Write                   Controls permission to change the properties of a custom key store
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:UpdateKeyDescription                                                         Write                   Controls permission to delete or change the description of an AWS KMS key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:UpdatePrimaryRegion                                                          Write                   Controls permission to update the primary Region of a multi-Region primary key
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:Verify                                                                       Write                   Controls permission to use the specified AWS KMS key to verify digital signatures
AWS Key Management Service                               kms:VerifyMac                                                                    Write                   Controls permission to use the AWS KMS key to verify message authentication codes

Amazon Route 53                                          route53:ActivateKeySigningKey                                                    Write                   Grants permission to activate a key-signing key so that it can be used for signing by DNSSEC
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:AssociateVPCWithHostedZone                                               Write                   Grants permission to associate an additional Amazon VPC with a private hosted zone

Amazon Route 53                                          route53:ChangeResourceRecordSets                                                 Write                   Grants permission to create, update, or delete a record, which contains authoritative DNS information for a specified domain or subdomain name

Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateCidrCollection                                                     Write                   Grants permission to create a new CIDR collection
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateHealthCheck                                                        Write                   Grants permission to create a new health check, which monitors the health and performance of your web applications, web servers, and other resources
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateHostedZone                                                         Write                   Grants permission to create a public hosted zone, which you use to specify how the Domain Name System (DNS) routes traffic on the Internet for a domain, such as example.com, and its subdomains
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateKeySigningKey                                                      Write                   Grants permission to create a new key-signing key associated with a hosted zone
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateQueryLoggingConfig                                                 Write                   Grants permission to create a configuration for DNS query logging
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateReusableDelegationSet                                              Write                   Grants permission to create a delegation set (a group of four name servers) that can be reused by multiple hosted zones
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateTrafficPolicy                                                      Write                   Grants permission to create a traffic policy, which you use to create multiple DNS records for one domain name (such as example.com) or one subdomain name (such as www.example.com)
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateTrafficPolicyInstance                                              Write                   Grants permission to create records in a specified hosted zone based on the settings in a specified traffic policy version
Amazon Route 53                                          route53:CreateTrafficPolicyVersion                                               Write                   Grants permission to create a new version of an existing traffic policy

Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:AssociateFirewallRuleGroup                                       Write                   Grants permission to associate an Amazon VPC with a specified firewall rule group
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:AssociateResolverEndpointIpAddress                               Write                   Grants permission to associate a specified IP address with a Resolver endpoint. This is an IP address that DNS queries pass through on the way to your network (outbound) or your VPCs (inbound)
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:AssociateResolverQueryLogConfig                                  Write                   Grants permission to associate an Amazon VPC with a specified query logging configuration

Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:CreateOutpostResolver                                            Write                   Grants permission to create a Route 53 Resolver on Outposts
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:CreateResolverEndpoint                                           Write                   Grants permission to create a Resolver endpoint. There are two types of Resolver endpoints, inbound and outbound
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:CreateResolverQueryLogConfig                                     Write                   Grants permission to create a Resolver query logging configuration, which defines where you want Resolver to save DNS query logs that originate in your VPCs
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:CreateResolverRule                                               Write                   Grants permission to define how to route queries originating from your VPC out of the VPC
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DeleteFirewallDomainList                                         Write                   Grants permission to delete a Firewall domain list
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DeleteFirewallRule                                               Write                   Grants permission to delete a Firewall rule within a Firewall rule group
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DeleteFirewallRuleGroup                                          Write                   Grants permission to delete a Firewall rule group
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DeleteOutpostResolver                                            Write                   Grants permission to delete a Route 53 Resolver on Outposts
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DeleteResolverEndpoint                                           Write                   Grants permission to delete a Resolver endpoint. The effect of deleting a Resolver endpoint depends on whether it's an inbound or an outbound endpoint
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DeleteResolverQueryLogConfig                                     Write                   Grants permission to delete a Resolver query logging configuration
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DeleteResolverRule                                               Write                   Grants permission to delete a Resolver rule
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DisassociateFirewallRuleGroup                                    Write                   Grants permission to remove the association between a specified Firewall rule group and a specified VPC
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DisassociateResolverEndpointIpAddress                            Write                   Grants permission to remove a specified IP address from a Resolver endpoint. This is an IP address that DNS queries pass through on the way to your network (outbound) or your VPCs (inbound)
Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:DisassociateResolverQueryLogConfig                               Write                   Grants permission to remove the association between a specified Resolver query logging configuration and a specified VPC

Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:GetResolverEndpoint                                              Read                    Grants permission to get information about a specified Resolver endpoint, such as whether it's an inbound or an outbound endpoint, and the IP addresses in your VPC that DNS queries are forwarded to on the way into or out of your VPC

Amazon Route 53 Resolver                                 route53resolver:GetResolverQueryLogConfigAssociation                             Read                    Grants permission to get information about a specified association between a Resolver query logging configuration and an Amazon VPC. When you associate a VPC with a query logging configuration, Resolver logs DNS queries that originate in that VPC

Amazon SageMaker                                         sagemaker:StopProcessingJob                                                      Write                   Grants permission to stop a processing job. To stop a job, Amazon SageMaker sends the algorithm the SIGTERM signal, which delays job termination for 120 seconds
Amazon SageMaker                                         sagemaker:StopTrainingJob                                                        Write                   Grants permission to stop a training job. To stop a job, Amazon SageMaker sends the algorithm the SIGTERM signal, which delays job termination for 120 seconds
Amazon SageMaker                                         sagemaker:StopTransformJob                                                       Write                   Grants permission to stop a transform job. When Amazon SageMaker receives a StopTransformJob request, the status of the job changes to Stopping. After Amazon SageMaker stops the job, the status is set to Stopped

AWS X-Ray                                                xray:BatchGetTraces                                                              List                    Grants permission to retrieve a list of traces specified by ID. Each trace is a collection of segment documents that originates from a single request. Use GetTraceSummaries to get a list of trace IDs
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:BatchGetTraceSummaryById                                                    Read                    Grants permission to retrieve metadata for a list of traces specified by ID
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:CreateGroup                                                                 Write                   Grants permission to create a group resource with a name and a filter expression
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:CreateSamplingRule                                                          Write                   Grants permission to create a rule to control sampling behavior for instrumented applications
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:DeleteGroup                                                                 Write                   Grants permission to delete a group resource
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:DeleteResourcePolicy                                                        Write                   Grants permission to delete resource policies
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:DeleteSamplingRule                                                          Write                   Grants permission to delete a sampling rule
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetDistinctTraceGraphs                                                      Read                    Grants permission to retrieve distinct service graphs for one or more specific trace IDs
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetEncryptionConfig                                                         Read                    Grants permission to retrieve the current encryption configuration for X-Ray data
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetGroup                                                                    Read                    Grants permission to retrieve group resource details
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetGroups                                                                   Read                    Grants permission to retrieve all active group details
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetInsight                                                                  Read                    Grants permission to retrieve the details of a specific insight
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetInsightEvents                                                            Read                    Grants permission to retrieve the events of a specific insight
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetInsightImpactGraph                                                       Read                    Grants permission to retrieve the part of the service graph which is impacted for a specific insight
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetInsightSummaries                                                         Read                    Grants permission to retrieve the summary of all insights for a group and time range with optional filters
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetSamplingRules                                                            Read                    Grants permission to retrieve all sampling rules
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetSamplingStatisticSummaries                                               Read                    Grants permission to retrieve information about recent sampling results for all sampling rules
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetSamplingTargets                                                          Read                    Grants permission to request a sampling quota for rules that the service is using to sample requests
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetServiceGraph                                                             Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a document that describes services that process incoming requests, and downstream services that they call as a result
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetTimeSeriesServiceStatistics                                              Read                    Grants permission to retrieve an aggregation of service statistics defined by a specific time range bucketed into time intervals
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetTraceGraph                                                               Read                    Grants permission to retrieve a service graph for one or more specific trace IDs
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:GetTraceSummaries                                                           Read                    Grants permission to retrieve IDs and metadata for traces available for a specified time frame using an optional filter. To get the full traces, pass the trace IDs to BatchGetTraces
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:Link                                                                        Write                   Grants permission to share X-Ray resources with a monitoring account
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:ListResourcePolicies                                                        List                    Grants permission to list resource policies
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:ListTagsForResource                                                         List                    Grants permission to list tags for an X-Ray resource
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:PutEncryptionConfig                                                         Permissions management  Grants permission to update the encryption configuration for X-Ray data
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:PutResourcePolicy                                                           Write                   Grants permission to create or update resource policies
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:PutTelemetryRecords                                                         Write                   Grants permission to send AWS X-Ray daemon telemetry to the service
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:PutTraceSegments                                                            Write                   Grants permission to upload segment documents to AWS X-Ray. The X-Ray SDK generates segment documents and sends them to the X-Ray daemon, which uploads them in batches
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:TagResource                                                                 Tagging                 Grants permission to add tags to an X-Ray resource
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:UntagResource                                                               Tagging                 Grants permission to remove tags from an X-Ray resource
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:UpdateGroup                                                                 Write                   Grants permission to update a group resource
AWS X-Ray                                                xray:UpdateSamplingRule                                                          Write                   Grants permission to modify a sampling rule's configuration
